title: Two Storied House Available for Sale in Gampaha
details:
House built in a 15 Perches Land available for Sale in Oruthota Road, Gampaha. The house consist of 4 Bedrooms with 2 Attached bathrooms, 2 Common bathrooms, Living room, Dining room, TV Lobby, Pantry, kitchen. Contains all the facilities required for a luxury living. 2 mints drive to Kandy – Colombo main road (Mudungoda Junction) and easy access to Southern Highway Kadawatha Entrance

The house is fully tiled and contains ceiling.
CCTV cameras attached in 5 sides.
A/C master bedroom.
Well maintained Garden.
Right round Boundary wall
